channel.title: SomeOne Help Me

item.title: SomeOne Help Me
item.dc:creator: @red_rooster red_rooster
item.description:
@red_rooster wrote:

noteim using czar if that has anything to do with this

im adding a bounty hunter type game to myserver, i need a code were to go through the portal u need a certain cb lvl

here is what i have so far

case 7288: // bh portL 
if (playerLevel[CB] >= 60){
teleportToX = 2524;
teleportToY = 3495;
sendMessage("welcome to the low level bounty");
}
else if (playerLevel[CB] >= 95){
teleportToX = 3218;
teleportToY = 3944;
sendMessage("welcome to medium level bounty hunter");
}
else if (playerLevel[CB] >= 127){
teleportToX = 3218;
teleportToY = 3944;
sendMessage("welcome to high level bounty hunter");
}
break;

i know this is wrong but could someone correct it for me?

Read full topic
